channel.title: Tube Amp Modeling
channel.description:
Has anyone attempted to model a tube amplifier? Maybe not to the extent of Line 6's models, but along those same lines?
I'm interested in doing this myself, but I am hoping I can find someone to work with me on this. I have modeled a Fender Champ in LTSpice. I would like to gather the required data from that on the transfer function and then model it in an Axoloti object.
